mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Boards (title, content, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select b.title, b.content, b.create_time, m.nickname, b.is_deleted as isDeleted from boards b join members m on b.member_Id = m.member_id where b.board_id = #{boardId} and b.is_deleted = false

select b.board_id, b.title, m.nickname, b.create_time from boards b inner join members m on b.member_id = m.member_id where b.is_deleted = false order by b.board_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset};

select b.board_id, b.title, m.nickname, b.create_time from boards b inner join members m on b.member_id = m.member_id
and b.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and m.nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and b.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and b.is_deleted = false
order by b.board_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset};

select count(*) from boards
and title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and member_id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
and content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
